snippet.title: Adventures of Chris - Nintendo Switch Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Graffiti Games and Guin Entertainment today announced that the adventure platformer Adventures of Chris is coming to Nintendo Switch this Summer!

Set in the greatest year ever, 1995, protagonist Chris is kidnapped, mocked and transformed into a balloon, but manages to escape by floating off on a global adventure. Driven by determination, superpowers such as fireballs, and most importantly cookies, Chris is on a mission to defeat the forces of villainy to save children from around the world and make it home in time for dessert. Inspired by ‘90s cartoons, Adventures of Chris is chock-full of humor and invigorating combat that players will use to transform Chris from a weak kid into the ultimate hero. 

Buy Nintendo eShop Gift Cards:
Playasia: https://bit.ly/2RN9MHm
Amazon US: https://amzn.to/3ajGQNJ
Amazon UK: https://amzn.to/3alDV7g

Buy Nintendo Switch Games:
Playasia: https://bit.ly/3bozklW
Amazon US: https://amzn.to/2wOZiA3
Amazon UK: https://amzn.to/2VFrMET

Buy Nintendo Switch Consoles:

Amazon US: https://amzn.to/34RyiMT
Amazon UK: https://amzn.to/2VhFyhU

Buy Nintendo Switch Lite:
